Name: Weeping Willow of the Lake
Title: Weeping Willow of the Lake
Desc: In ancient times, the weeping willow of the lake was an object of reverence. All the water veins converge upon Erinnyes and the weeping willow flourishes or withers when the waters are sweet or bitter.

Talent.Name: Weeping Willow of the Lake
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> If your Hand has no more than 2 cards, draw 2 cards.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
